mapper.select: SELECT issueSeq AS ISSUESEQ , title AS TITLE , workSeq AS WORKSEQ , workName AS WORKNAME , projectSeq AS PROJECTSEQ , projectName AS PROJECTNAME , TO_CHAR(regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDATE , TO_CHAR(hopeDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOPEDATE , TO_CHAR(manageDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MANAGEDATE , content AS CONTENT , imergency AS IMERGENCY , iType AS ITYPE , iStateSeq AS ISTATESEQ , iRoleSeq AS IROLESEQ FROM TBLISSUE WHERE employeeseq = #{employeeseq} order by MANAGEDATE desc, IMERGENCY
select projectseq AS projectseq, name AS name from tblproject where projectseq in (select projectseq from tblteam where employeeSeq = #{employeeSeq})

select w.workseq as workseq, w.name as name, e.employeeseq as employeeseq from tblWork w inner join tblTeam t on w.teamseq = t.teamseq inner join tblemployee e on t.employeeseq = e.employeeseq where e.employeeseq = #{employeeSeq}
mapper.insert: insert all into tblIssue (issueSeq, title, workSeq, workName, projectSeq, projectName, regDate, hopeDate, content, imergency, iType, iStateSeq, employeeseq) values (issueSeq.nextval, #{title}, #{workseq}, (select name from tblwork where workSeq = #{workseq}), #{projectseq}, (select name from tblproject where projectSeq = #{projectseq}), sysdate, #{hopedate}, #{content}, #{imergency}, #{itype}, #{istateseq}, #{employeeseq}) into tblOutput(outputSeq, workSeq, oTypeSeq, regDate, version, issueSeq) values(outputseq.nextVal, #{workseq}, 5, sysdate, 1, issueSeq.nextval) into tblFile(fileSeq, outputSeq, title) values(fileSeq.nextVal, outputseq.nextVal, #{ftitle}) select * from dual
